svg.title: XsdVi

g.text: Container for defining derived units in terms of their root
units. This allows a precise definition of a wide range of
units. The goal is to improve interoperability among
applications and databases which use derived units based on
Element for a root unit (from an extensive enumerated list)
allowing an optional prefix and power. E.g., mm^2
Element for those special cases where the root unit needed is
not included in the enumerated list in the above element.
